issues.title: Login issue on mobile app
issues.description: Customer reports being unable to log in through the mobile application on both Android and iOS platforms. The login screen either fails to respond or returns a generic 'login failed' error despite correct credentials being used. The issue started after the latest app update and has persisted across multiple devices and network conditions.

issues.title: Payment declined unexpectedly
issues.description: Customer attempted to complete a purchase using a valid credit card that has sufficient funds, but the transaction was declined during the checkout process. Error messages were unclear, and multiple attempts with different cards also failed. Issue may be tied to payment gateway or fraud detection rules.

issues.title: Order not delivered
issues.description: Customer placed an order over 10 days ago and has not received it. Tracking information is either unavailable or shows no movement since the initial shipping confirmation. Attempts to contact support for status updates have gone unanswered, raising concerns about potential fulfillment or shipping partner issues.

issues.title: Bug in settings page
issues.description: When users attempt to update their account details—such as email or password—on the settings page, the application crashes unexpectedly. The crash occurs immediately after hitting 'Save Changes', with no data being updated. The issue affects multiple users on both web and mobile platforms.

issues.title: Unable to reset password
issues.description: Customer has tried to reset their password multiple times but has not received any reset email. Checked spam/junk folders with no success. The issue appears to affect more than one user and may be tied to email service delays or backend logic failures in generating reset tokens.

issues.title: App freezes on launch
issues.description: Upon opening the Android version of the app, it immediately freezes on the loading screen. Users have attempted clearing cache and reinstalling the app, but the issue persists. Logs show potential memory leaks or conflicts with device OS updates. Issue started after version 5.2.1 release.

issues.title: Incorrect billing amount
issues.description: Customer reports being charged twice for the same product purchase. Invoice history shows a duplicated transaction with identical timestamps and order IDs. The user is requesting a full refund for the duplicate charge and an explanation for the billing discrepancy.

issues.title: Need feature explanation
issues.description: User is confused about how the analytics dashboard tracks and displays metrics such as conversion rate, user retention, and engagement. Documentation appears insufficient or outdated. The customer is requesting a walkthrough or updated guide to better utilize this feature.

issues.title: Request for data export
issues.description: Customer is requesting a full export of all their account-related data in CSV format, including purchase history, preferences, and usage logs. This may be for personal backup or data portability under GDPR-like regulations. The request was submitted through the settings page.

issues.title: Website loads slowly
issues.description: Customer reports that the website homepage takes over 15 seconds to load fully on both desktop and mobile browsers. The issue appears to be worse during peak traffic hours. Likely causes include unoptimized scripts, excessive image sizes, or CDN latency.

issues.title: Missing invoice email
issues.description: Customer did not receive an invoice email after completing a recent purchase. The purchase confirmation email was received, but the invoice PDF attachment was missing. This is affecting expense reporting and accounting on the customer’s end.

issues.title: Duplicate account problem
issues.description: Customer accidentally created two accounts using the same email address. This has led to confusion during login, with alternating access to different data sets. Merging of accounts or deletion of one is required to restore a consistent user experience.

issues.title: Subscription canceled unexpectedly
issues.description: Customer's premium subscription was canceled without any request or prior notification. Their account lost premium features suddenly, and billing history does not show any refund or termination reason. This could be due to a backend automation or failed payment retry logic.

issues.title: Security concern: suspicious login
issues.description: Customer received an email alert indicating that their account was accessed from an unknown device or location. They did not initiate this login and are concerned their account may be compromised. MFA is not currently enabled on the account. Customer has requested immediate review and account lock.

issues.title: Can't upload profile picture
issues.description: Customer is attempting to upload a profile photo but receives an error message stating the file format is unsupported. File meets the standard JPEG/PNG size and resolution requirements. May be caused by MIME type mismatch or frontend validation error.

issues.title: App not syncing with cloud
issues.description: Customer reports that changes made on the mobile app (e.g., notes, settings) do not appear on their desktop app, indicating a sync failure. Internet connection is stable. Possibly due to background sync process not triggering or outdated local cache versions.

issues.title: Account deleted accidentally
issues.description: Customer claims their account was deleted or reset after modifying some settings. They lost access to their purchase history and saved data. No deletion request was made. This could be due to a bug in the account settings logic or a permissions error.

issues.title: Feedback form not working
issues.description: User submitted feedback through the in-app form, but the 'Submit' button appears unresponsive. There is no confirmation or success message, and the form fields remain filled. This may be a frontend JS issue or API endpoint failure.

issues.title: Email notifications too frequent
issues.description: Customer is receiving repetitive notification emails multiple times a day for the same event (e.g., comment replies, order status). This leads to inbox clutter and frustration. Likely tied to a notification system loop or missed de-duplication logic.

issues.title: Promo code not applied
issues.description: Customer entered a valid promotional code during checkout, but the discount was not reflected in the cart total. The code was confirmed to be active and within the usage period. Possibly due to conflicting cart conditions or promo rule misconfiguration.
